name: Haru Cats: Slide Block Puzzle
description:
Haru cats: Slide block puzzle is a relaxing block puzzle game. Haru will be your friend to help you emotionally re-charge, reduce stress and increase positive social interactions.
Join Haru, the chubby with CATitude cat with his new journey in this FOREVER FREE jigsaw-like puzzle game.

It's really easy to play:
- Slide Haru blocks left or right to create a full line, clear the row.
- Use cutest boosters to unlock when you're stuck.
- Training your brain to beat your own score!
- Unlock Haru Cat characters and use them as stickers in iMessage.
- Beautifully easy and loveable, no pressure, no time limit.
- The endless challenge, you could play forever yet you'll still find something undiscovered.
- Perfectly small install size that won’t hurt your storage
- Visually informative chart to check your progress every single day
Instantly sharing on Facebook to compete with your friends and family
Let's take a break at any time with Haru for free for as long as you like. Then support Haru team when you think it’s worth.


Reviews from our users:
FUN, EASY AND ENTERTAINING!
It's an awesome relaxing game and I'm definitely hooked. It likes a fun little puzzle and relatively short to play. Love it.

FANTASTIC AND RELAXING CASUAL GAME.
It's a little like Tetris but has a more leisurely pace. It's also simple but challenging. A puurfect puzzle game that you can relax and play.

IT'S CHALLENGING AND FUN!
I love the cat very much, it's bright and cute. This is a good time killer and it can get challenging to get a higher score.
